name: Just Roll With It (itch) (GDPanda, maren, 1cebell, torbs, idalikerbeikon)
name_original: Just Roll With It (itch) (GDPanda, maren, 1cebell, torbs, idalikerbeikon)
description:
MADE FOR BRACKEYS GAMEJAM 2023.1: Theme "An end is a new beginning"

Deliver Gachapon capsules up the mountain to the Gachapon God.
It's a tough job, but someone has to do it. Just roll with it.

Oh and take out a few crabs on the way up, they've been taking over the mountain lately. I'll give you some points for it. :)

The more points you get, the longer you have to roll! Keep it up!

Feeling tired of rolling but want to keep going? Fret not! Exiting the game saves all your points for a later occasion! How many can you gather?

HOW TO MOVE:

You move with W A S D or ARROW KEYS. (Left Joystick on controller!)
To brake press SPACE. (South Button on controller!)
To jump if you're stuck press SPACE 2 times. (South Button on controller!)

CREDITS:

Jonas Odden - Programmer

Icebell - 3D & 2D Art

Ida - 3D Art

Torbjørn Svendsen - Sound Design

Maren Holm - Sound Design

Petter Moland - Composer
